title: SFDC Loan
body:
Good news - We were approved for the 2nd part of our loan! We're now up to $50,000 in borrowed capital.

Bad news - We need an additional $5,000, on top of the $10,000 we've already scrounged up, to secure it.

More to come...
author: Dan

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I know! I can hardly contain myself.

comments.author: Shannon
comments.body:
I noticed you didn't have a thing for donations anymore. I usually give money to something around the holidays, and I thought I'd contribute to the Moxie, having grown up in a place with little o no access to independent cinema...

So, if you ever start taking donations again, I've got money with your name on it. Okay, so it's not my money so much as the government's, but that's all the more reason to spend it, I say. I daresay my student loans could be put to no better use.

Best of luck, though! I enjoy reading about the progress you guys are making.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I know that link's around here somewhere...!

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: $50000!? Looks like I better start selling those scarves I've been cranking out...

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Woo hoo! We can finally free up our couches!

comments.author: Shannon
comments.body: Hey, let me know where to go and my money is yours, though in admittedly limited amounts.  In the meantime, I'll have to content myself to buy Moxie stuff.  I'm eyeing that messenger tote especially.  And when people here ask me what the Moxie is I'll tell them all about you.  New Yorkers love a cause!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Click on the big red present on the left side of the screen... below the menus.

comments.author: justin
comments.body: Scarves, you say?  I'll buy one!

comments.author: einaphets
comments.body: Scarves? I thought you were selling kidneys and peices of your liver.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body:
Justin: Nicole better start cranking them out!

Einaphets: No no no. Kidney-COLORED scarves.

comments.author: justin
comments.body: I'm in the market for a scarve.  My neck is cold!

comments.author: justin
comments.body: How about I donate my fist to your face?

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: How about I donate a garbage can lid to your fist!

comments.author: Raul J. Garza
comments.body: I just like to say that I admire your courage in starting your new business venture. I live in Corpus Christi, Tx. and I think our city could benifit from something similar to what your doing. I may be looking into something similar to what your doing for our growing downtown area.
